1 import sys
2 from enum import Enum

5 class RegistersMCP23017(Enum):
6  IODIRA = 0x00
7  IODIRB = 0x01
8  IPOLA = 0x02
9  IPOLB = 0x03
10  GPINTENA = 0x04
11  GPINTENB = 0x05
12  DEFVALA = 0x06
13  DEFVALB = 0x07
14  INTCONA = 0x08
15  INTCONB = 0x09
16  IOCONA = 0x0A
17  IOCONB = 0x0B
18  GPPUA = 0x0C
19  GPPUB = 0x0D
20  INTFA = 0x0E
21  INTFB = 0x0F
22  INTCAPA = 0x10
23  INTCAPB = 0x11
24  GPIOA = 0x12
25  GPIOB = 0x13
26  OLATA = 0x14
27  OLATB = 0x15
28 
29 
30 class MCP23017(object):
31  OUTPUT = 0
32  INPUT = 1
33 
34  def __init__(self, address, busnum=0):
35  self.__address = address
36  self.__bus = busnum
37  self.__num_gpios = 16
38  self.__direction = 0x00
39 
40  if sys.version[0] == '3':
41  import Adafruit_GPIO.I2C as I2C
42  self.i2c = I2C.Device(self.__address, self.__bus)
43  else:
44  from Adafruit_I2C import Adafruit_I2C
45  self.i2c = Adafruit_I2C(self.__address, self.__bus)
46 
47  self.init_config()
48 
49  def __str__(self):
50  return 'MCP23017, bus {}, address {}'.format(self.__bus, self.__address)
51 
52  @property
53  def address(self):
54  return self.__address
55 
56  @property
57  def bus(self):
58  return self.__bus
59 
60  def init_config(self):
61  self.write8(RegistersMCP23017.IODIRA, 0b00000010) # all outputs on port A
62  self.write8(RegistersMCP23017.IODIRB, 0x00) # all outputs on port B
63  self.__direction = self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.IODIRA)
64  self.__direction |= self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.IODIRB) << 8
65  self.write8(RegistersMCP23017.GPPUA, 0x00)
66  self.write8(RegistersMCP23017.GPPUB, 0x00)
67  self.write8(RegistersMCP23017.IOCONA, 0b00000100) # INTA as open-drain
68 
69  def config(self, pin, mode):
70  if pin < 8:
71  self.__direction &= 0xF0
72  self.__direction |= self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.IODIRA, pin, mode)
73  else:
74  self.__direction &= 0x0F
75  self.__direction |= self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.IODIRB, pin - 8, mode) << 8
76  return self.__direction
77 
78  def output(self, pin, value):
79  assert self.__direction & (1 << pin) == 0, "Pin %s not set to output" % pin
80 
81  if pin < 8:
82  return self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.GPIOA, pin, value, self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.OLATA))
83  else:
84  return self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.GPIOB, pin - 8, value,
85  self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.OLATB)) << 8
86 
87  def input(self, pin):
88  assert 0 <= pin < self.__num_gpios, "Pin number %s is invalid, only 0-%s are valid" % (pin, self.__num_gpios)
89  assert self.__direction & (1 << pin) != 0, "Pin %s not set to input" % pin
90 
91  if pin < 8:
92  return self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.GPIOA) & (1 << pin)
93  else:
94  return self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.GPIOB) & (1 << pin - 8)
95 
96  def enable_interrupt(self, pin, enable):
97  assert 0 <= pin < self.__num_gpios, "Pin number %s is invalid, only 0-%s are valid" % (pin, self.__num_gpios)
98 
99  if pin < 8:
100  self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.GPINTENA, pin, int(enable))
101  else:
102  self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.GPINTENB, pin - 8, int(enable))
103 
104  def pullup(self, pin, value):
105  if (pin < 8):
106  return self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.GPPUA, pin, value)
107  else:
108  return self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.GPPUB, pin - 8, value) << 8 | self.readU8(
109  RegistersMCP23017.GPPUA)
110 
111  def reverse_input_polarity(self, pin, reverse):
112  value = bool(reverse)
113  if (pin < 8):
114  return self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.IPOLA, pin, value)
115  else:
116  return self._read_and_change_pin(RegistersMCP23017.IPOLB, pin - 8, value) << 8 | self.readU8(
117  RegistersMCP23017.IPOLA)
118 
119  def read_all_gpios(self):
120  value = self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.GPIOA)
121  value |= self.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.GPIOB) << 8
122  return value
123 
124  def write8(self, register, value):
125  assert isinstance(register, RegistersMCP23017), "The register must be a member of the RegistersMCP23017 enum."
126 
127  self.i2c.write8(register.value, value)
128 
129  def readU8(self, register):
130  assert isinstance(register, RegistersMCP23017), "The register must be a member of the RegistersMCP23017 enum."
131 
132  return self.i2c.readU8(register.value)
133 
134  def debug(self):
135  print(34 * "-")
136  print("| {:^30s} |".format("MCP23017 registers BANK=0"))
137  for name, member in RegistersMCP23017.__members__.items():
138  print(34 * "-")
139  print("| {:^10s} | 0x{:02X} | 0b{:08b} |".format(name, member.value, self.readU8(member)))
140  print(34 * "-")
141 
142  @staticmethod
143  def _change_bit(bitmap, bit, value):
144  assert value == 1 or value == 0, "Value is %s must be 1 or 0" % value
145  if value == 1:
146  return bitmap | (1 << bit)
147  else:
148  return bitmap & ~(1 << bit)
149 
150  def _read_and_change_pin(self, port, pin, value, current_value=None):
151  assert pin <= pin < self.__num_gpios, "Pin number %s is invalid, only 0-%s are valid" % (pin, self.__num_gpios)
152 
153  if not current_value:
154  current_value = self.readU8(port)
155 
156  new_value = self._change_bit(current_value, pin, value)
157  self.write8(port, new_value)
158  return new_value
